With the tablet support we have introduced the Card Layout. This allows us to abandon the navigation bar from all pages. Instead of this we should have a fixed navigation bar, which only displays the title / buttons of the current page.
Advantages: * Splitting page from Navigation Logic * The navigation bar is not scrolled anymore when a page is changed * Android title bars are easier to implement (no scrolling on page change) * iOS navigation bars are easier to implement (fading of title / buttons can be done) * We can add static content, which is never changed during page changes

We can do this without deprecating the code:
We can introduce the navigationContainer: * NavigationContainer
-> This container will access the interface methods getTitle / getLeftContainer / getRightContainer from the page
-> The navigationPage can implement those methods and provide the back- / button.
